해커스 인강

Writing Practice Test

첨삭프로그램 성적확인

Question

suji120 : 8096-141398
Multicultural societies contain many different ethnic groups that all have their own distinct cultures. What are the advantages and disadvantages of multicultural societies? Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own know

Essay

0 word
As time goes by, citizen can more money so they can spend their money in many ways through the consumption. However, the trash problem is a serious issue of the central city from people’s spending. I will suggest the cause of this condition and how to solve this difficult problem with my knowledge.(1) Although peopleare always interested in vanishing the trash, they do not care about where the trash are gone and how to manage them. It is because ordinary people think that it is not their business and they live busy day from their hard work. For example some citizens never separate waste so they put plastics and papers altogether.(2) Even they do not vanish the garbage in the trash can so it makes the street dirty and messy The worst thing is that when the place which burns the trash or recycles them start to establish,(3) inhabitants object to the result strongly due to smell and atmosphere of the place. Therefore, the uncomfortable feeling of people is the first cause of this issue.
